```{r, echo = FALSE, align = "c", fig.width=10, fig.height=3, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
Dose = factor(c(rep(1,100000), 
         rep(2,100000),
         rep(3,100000),
         rep(4,100000),
         rep(5,100000),
         rep(6,100000),
         rep(7,100000)))

Response  = c(rnorm(100000, -100, 28), 
         rnorm(100000, -75, 25), 
         rnorm(100000, -40, 22), 
         rnorm(100000, 0, 20), 
         rnorm(100000, 40, 22), 
         rnorm(100000, 75, 25), 
         rnorm(100000, 100, 28))

df <- data.frame(Dose, Response)
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(df, aes(Response, group=Dose, fill=Dose)) + geom_density(alpha = .3) +
  labs(x = "", y = " ", group = "", fill = " ")  + 
  guides(fill = FALSE) + 
    theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(),
        axis.text.x=element_blank(),
        axis.text.y=element_blank())
```
